name: RC Q Lemon Pet
description:
RC Q Lemon Pet 250 ml is a refreshing lemon-flavored beverage that offers a zesty burst of flavor in every sip. Perfectly carbonated, it provides a crisp and invigorating taste, making it an ideal choice for quenching your thirst on hot days or during meals. Enjoy the delightful blend of citrus and effervescence with RC Q Lemon.

name: Coca-Cola
description:
Coca-Cola Original Taste Soft Drink PET Bottle 250ML.  Highlights:  ORIGINAL FLAVOUR: Enjoy the deliciously refreshing original cola flavour of Coca-Cola   BEST ENJOYED ICE-COLD: Enjoy this soft drink ice-cold for maximum refreshment   YOUR MEAL PARTNER: Make meals tastier with a combo of your favourite dish and a chilled glass of Coke   SHARE A COKE: Enjoy the real magic of everyday moments and share this cold drink with family & friends   ANYTIME & ANYWHERE: Enjoy Coca-Cola’s crisp, delicious taste anytime with meals, at parties, or family gatherings   RECYCLABLE BOTTLES: Coca-Cola comes in recyclable bottle packaging     Description:  Happiness is about creating Real Magic from everyday moments, turning up the energy during an afternoon lull, during those hot and long exhausting days with the crisp, delicious taste of Coca-Cola Original. Make your meals tastier & share a Coke ice-cold for maximum refreshment. Enjoy this carbonated soft drink while playing fun games, binge-watching your favourite series, listening to your favourite songs and making the most of your break moments. The oh-so refreshing fizz and original taste of Coca-Cola soft drink make life’s special moments a little more special.

name: Sprite
description:
Highlights:   REFRESHING TASTE: Open a bottle of Sprite and have a refreshing sip of this soft drink packed with the deliciousness of lemon & lime   NO ADDED COLOUR: This flavoured soft drink is a clear carbonated soft drink and contains no added colours in it  ULTIMATE FIZZ: Release your stress with a chilled glass of the fizzy Sprite soft drink  RECYCLABLE BOTTLES: Sprite comes in  recyclable bottle packaging.  Description:  Refreshing people since 1999, Sprite will quench your thirst, leaving you feeling refreshed. Sprite strongly believes in removing all the unnecessary stress from your life so that you can chill for real. Enjoy the flavour of lemon & lime packed with the ultimate fizz in a cold glass of Sprite. Have a chilled glass of this flavoured soft drink and reset, refresh & break the monotony of everyday life stress. Be it summer or winter, charge your body with the crisp & cool taste of Sprite soft drink.

description:
Fresh Mojito is a Lemon and Mint Flavor Carbonated Beverage which composition of Carbonated Water, Refined Sugar, Citric Acid Anhydrous (E330), Sodium Benzoate (E211), Ascorbic Acid (E300) & Permitted natural dentical Flavors.

name: Mountain Dew
description:
Mountain Dew is a carbonated soft drink with a citrus flavor that comes in a 500 ml bottle. It is a refreshing beverage that is perfect for quenching thirst and providing an energy boost. The drink is made with natural and artificial flavors, high fructose corn syrup, caffeine, and a blend of concentrated orange, lemon, and lime juices. Mountain Dew has a distinctive green color and a unique taste that appeals to fans of bold and bold flavors.

name: Fresh Club 9 Soda
description:
Fresh Club 9 Soda (500 ml) is a fizzy, refreshing beverage perfect for any occasion. With it's crisp, bubbly texture, it provides a delightful pick-me-up and is ideal for pairing with meals or enjoying on it's own. The vibrant flavors and effervescence make it a popular choice for parties, picnics, or casual gatherings. Enjoy the refreshing taste of Fresh Club 9 Soda and elevate your drinking experience with every sip!

name: Evervess Club Soda
description:
Evervess Club Soda is a carbonated beverage that comes in a 600 ml bottle. It is a clear and crisp soda that is perfect for mixing with other beverages or enjoying on its own. Evervess Club Soda is made with high-quality ingredients and contains no calories, making it a great option for those who are watching their weight or looking for a refreshing, guilt-free drink. This soda is also caffeine-free and contains no artificial flavors or colors.

description:

name: Pepsi
description:
Ingredients: Carbonated Water, Sugar, Caffeine, Phosphoric Acid, Citric, Acid, Natural Flavours, Caramel Color (E150d), Sodium Benzoate (Preservative), Potassium Benzoate (Preservative). Pepsi is a globally recognized carbonated soft drink known for its crisp, refreshing taste. The 1-litre bottle is perfect for sharing with family and friends or for enjoying a large serving of your favorite soft drink. The sweet and fizzy beverage provides a satisfying experience with every sip. Usage:Best served chilled. Ideal for refreshing yourself on a hot day, pairing with meals, or sharing at parties and gatherings.

description:
Clemon is a refreshing lemon-flavored drink designed to rejuvenate and hydrate. It's crisp citrus taste provides an excellent balance of sweetness and tanginess. Packaged in a 1-liter bottle, it's perfect for sharing with family and friends. Rich in Vitamin C, ideal for hot days.

description:

name: Coca-Cola Zero Can
description:
Highlights:  ZERO SUGAR: Coca-Cola Zero comes in a new and real Coca-Cola taste without the sugar and calories  BEST ENJOYED ICE-COLD: Enjoy this soft drink ice-cold for maximum refreshment  IDEAL FOR CALORIE CONSCIOUS PEOPLE: This lighter cold drink is perfect for those who are calorie-conscious and want to monitor their intake   YOUR MEAL PARTNER: Make meals tastier with a combo of your favourite dish and a chilled glass of Coke  RECYCLABLE PACKAGING: Coca-Cola cans are  recyclable, ensuring environmental sustainability.     Description:  Discover a connection between fun, taste, no sugar & no calories with Coca-Cola Zero. This cold drink is a lighter carbonated soft drink without sugar & no calories, ideal for those who are calorie-conscious and want to monitor their intake. Enjoy an ice-cold can of Coke with your meals or while playing fun games, binge-watching your favourite series, listening to your favourite songs and making the most of your break moments. The oh-so-refreshing fizz and taste of the Coca-Cola Zero soft drink make life’s special moments a little more special.

name: Rooh Afza
description:
Vendor: Hamdard Laboratories (WAFQ) BD The matchless qualities and merits of Rooh Afza soon brought it to the notice of the people. By its distinctive taste, fragrance, and color it began, not only to attract the common people but also inspired the writers and poets to make it a theme of their creative efforts. The following verses of Sa’il Dehlvi (given here in their English translation) started appearing in Urdu not only in the advertisements of Rooh Afza but also on the wrapper of its bottle.

name: Sprite Can
description:
Highlights: REFRESHING TASTE: Crack open a cold can of Sprite and have a refreshing sip of this soft drink packed with the deliciousness of lemon & lime. NO ADDED COLOUR: This flavoured soft drink is a clear carbonated soft drink and contains no added colours in it  ULTIMATE FIZZ: Release your stress with a chilled glass of the fizzy Sprite soft drink  RECYCLABLE CANS: Sprite comes in  recyclable cans packaging. Sprite strongly believes in removing all the unnecessary stress from your life so that you can chill for real. Enjoy the flavour of lemon & lime packed with the ultimate fizz in a cold glass of Sprite. Have a chilled glass of this flavoured soft drink and reset, refresh & break the monotony of everyday life stress. Be it summer or winter, charge your body with the crisp & cool taste of Sprite soft drink.

Keep the dull & boring carbonated soft drinks away and bring out the fun & playful orangey FANTA.

name: Basil Seed Drink (Lychee)
description:
Basil Seed Drink (Lychee)  is a cooling and refreshing Vietnamese Drink. The Basil seeds have a delightful grape-like texture and are satisfying to chew as you drink. Delight your taste buds in every sip with the exotic and tropical flavors of Rita Basil seeds drinks.
Basil Seed Drink (Lychee)  is a cooling and refreshing Vietnamese Drink. The Basil seeds have a delightful grape-like texture and are satisfying to chew as you drink. Delight your taste buds in every sip with the exotic and tropical flavors of Rita Basil seeds drinks.

name: Basil Seed Drink (Apple)
description:
Basil Seed Drink (Apple) is a delightful fusion of flavors tantalizing your taste buds. Imagine biting into a crisp, juicy apple on a sunny day. Now imagine that essence captured in a drink. Basil seeds swirl in this elixir, adding a satisfying texture. The basil seeds add a delightful crunch, while the apple juice provides a sweet and tangy flavor. It’s a harmonious blend that leaves you feeling refreshed and energized.

name: Sprite Can (Imported)
description:
Crisp, refreshing and clean-tasting, Sprite is the world’s leading lemon and lime-flavoured soft drink.  Ingredients: Carbonated Water, Sugar, Citric Acid, Malic Acid, Acidity Regulator (Sodium Gluconate), Natural Lemon-Lime Flavourings, Sweetener (Steviol Glycosides).

name: Pepsi Can
description:
Through the years, Pepsi has evolved from being a cola drink to a brand that stands firmly for the all ages.  Pepsi is very popular drinks to everyone. Pepsi can refresh your body and keep active.

name: Mountain Dew Can
description:
The original the one that started it all. Mountain Dew exhilarate and quenches with its one of a kind taste and also available caffeine free free. Ingredients: CARBONATED WATER, HIGH FRUCTOSE CORN SYRUP, CONCENTRATED ORANGE JUICE, CITRIC ACID, NATURAL FLAVOR, SODIUM BENZOATE (PRESERVES FRESHNESS), CAFFEINE, SODIUM CITRATE, ERYTHORBIC ACID (PRESERVES FRESHNESS), GUM ARABIC, CALCIUM DISODIUM EDTA (TO PROTECT FLAVOR), BROMINATED VEGETABLE OIL, YELLOW 5

name: Schweppes Dry Ginger Ale Can
description:
Schweppes Dry Ginger Ale Can is part of the Schweppes Mixers range. It can be enjoyed on its own or combined with alcohol or fruit juice. Ingredients: Carbonated Water, Sugar, Flavourings Including Extracts of Ginger, Citric Acid, Colour (Caramel E150d).

name: Rooh Afza
description:
Vendor: Hamdard Laboratories (WAFQ) BD The matchless qualities and merits of Rooh Afza soon brought it to the notice of the people. By its distinctive taste, fragrance and color it began, not only to attract the common people , but also inspired the writers and poets to make it a theme of their creative efforts.

name: Coca-Cola Diet No Sugar
description:
Highlights:  A LIGHTER COLA: Enjoy the deliciously refreshing, lighter and crispier taste of Coca-Cola without sugar with Coca-Cola Diet Coke  IDEAL FOR CALORIE CONSCIOUS PEOPLE: With less than 1 calorie, enjoy this cold drink’s delicious taste without worrying about the calorie intake  BEST ENJOYED: Enjoy this soft drink ice-cold for maximum refreshment  YOUR MEAL PARTNER: Make meals tastier with a combo of your favourite dish and a chilled glass of Coke  RECYCLABLE PACKAGING: Coca-Cola cans are recyclable, ensuring environmental sustainability. Description:  Create Real Magic from everyday moments with the delicious, uplifting, and refreshing taste of Coca-Cola, without sugar & no calories. Diet Coke is a lighter carbonated soft drink ideal for those who are calorie conscious and want to monitor their intake. Enjoy an ice-cold can of Coke with your meals or while playing fun games, binge-watching your favourite series, listening to your favourite songs and making the most of your break moments. The oh-so refreshing fizz and taste of Diet Coke soft drink make life’s special moments a little more special.

name: Basil Seed Drink (White Grape)
description:
This refreshing and healthy Basil seed drink in White Grape flavor is the perfect, healthy drink to quench thirst. Basil seeds have some health benefits that help in reducing stress and cholesterol, while also facilitating digestion and providing many more benefits.
